name: Casual Crafter 3D
description:
Destroy blocks, mine ore and craft tools.

Casual Crafter 3D is an addictive zen inducing crafting game.

Destroy blocks, mine ore and craft over 40 tools.

Tap to break over 10 different blocks, collecting the ore as you go.

Use the ore to craft new and better tools increasing your power and gathering ability.

Clear the blocks to explore new Biomes including Mud,Sand and Snow.
